meanings.definition: The act of certifying in advance.
meanings.sent1: The precertifications for the event ensured everything was ready on time.
meanings.sent2: She submitted the precertifications to the insurance company before the procedure.
meanings.sent3: The precertifications were like golden tickets, granting access to exclusive benefits.
meanings.sent4: His meticulous precertifications were the foundation of his successful project management.
meanings.sent5: The precertifications acted as a shield, protecting against unexpected delays.

meanings.sent1: Make sure to keep the precertifications in a safe place for future reference.
meanings.sent2: The precertifications were printed on official letterhead for authenticity.
meanings.sent3: The precertifications were so official-looking, they could pass for diplomas.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of precertifications was a testament to her thorough preparation.
meanings.sent5: The precertifications were like keys, unlocking access to important services.
